scenario_text.value: Got a minute, Shuuji?
Uh, Shuuji?

Oh, sorry, I must have spaced out. What is
it, Takuma?

(I don’t think he heard me just now. He must
have something on his mind. Do I mention it?)
(What should I say to Shuuji?)
Not feeling well?
I’m counting on you!
You should relax.
Not feeling well?

Uh...you sure you’re okay, Shuuji? Are you
not feeling well?
No, I’m fine.
All right, if you say so.

That’s a lie! Shuuji, you’ve been worried
sick this whole time!
And you didn’t sleep at all last night.
Hey, Lopmon! You don’t have to tell him that!
But I’m worried about you, Shuuji.
Lopmon’s right.
I’m so worried about all this.
Shuuji...

Takuma, please! You have to look out for him,
okay?!
I will, don’t worry.
I’m counting on you!
I’m counting on you, Shuuji!
What? Yeah, sure, I won’t let you down.

Ha ha, I am the oldest after the Professor,
after all.
You should relax.
Shuuji, I think you need to try and relax.
What do you mean?

It’s just, you look like you’re really
stressed out.
What? No, I’m fine.

That’s a lie! Shuuji, you’ve been worried
sick this whole time!
And you didn’t sleep at all last night.
Hey, Lopmon! You don’t have to tell him that!
But I’m worried about you, Shuuji.

Takuma, please! You have to look out for him,
okay?!

At this rate, Shuuji, you’re going to fall
apart before we even get to the Master.
Lopmon...

Don’t worry, Lopmon. We’ll all make sure to
look out for Shuuji.

And Shuuji, try to let go of some of that
stress.
Lopmon, Takuma... Thank you.

I’m feeling better now, Takuma. Don’t worry.
Talking with you earlier helped me relax.

I’m sure you know what you need to do now,
don’t you?

You need to talk to everyone, not just me,
and help them get ready for this.

It’s something only you can do. Please,
you’re the leader.

You got it, Shuuji. I’ll do what I need to
do.

I’m feeling better now, Takuma. Why don’t you
go talk to the others?
